title: Hidden cameras that film injustice in the world’s most dangerous places
description: To see is to believe, says Oren Yakobovich — which is why he helps everyday people use hidden cameras to film dangerous situations of violence, political fraud and abuse. His organization, Videre, uncovers, verifies and publicizes human-rights abuses that the world needs to witness.
author: Oren Yakobovich
keywords: TED, talks, activism, film, global issues, online video, social change
